column1: The Purple Pig////The blood sausage was tasty
column2: but not as good as the Spanish blood sausage. The experience was like eating a hot dog and nothing great.  The pork shoulder was good
column3: but the best dish was the blade steak.   It was flavored well
column4: that it did not need the nudja sausage.  The nudja sausage tasted like Chinese sausage...not to my liking.
